pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 27, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario 

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Toronto, Ontario

6:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the NTN Bearing Corporation of Canadaâ€™s 50th Anniversary Celebration, and will deliver remarks. 

The Omni King Edward Hotel
37 King Street East

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks
    • Throw: 80 feet
    • Media should present themselves to the Kensington room on the second floor no later than 6:00 p.m.
